professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in database management, high availability, disaster recovery, and virtualization. Skilled in SSIS, RAC, transactional replication, and SAN storage management.

key_responsibilities: Managing SQL Server instances and ensuring high availability.
Implementing disaster recovery solutions using native and Quest Litespeed SQL backup and log shipping.
Consolidating the corporate SQL environment from 50 to 35 instances.
Performing routine database migrations and refreshes.
Monitoring systems and capturing performance data for tuning opportunities using tools like PolyMon
Setting up automation with SQL Agent and Database Mail for maintenance and error alerting.

education.degree: Bachelor of Health in Health Care Management
